name: podamShouldFillEmbeddedAbstractClassesIfAConcreteTypeHasBeenSpecified

testSteps.description: When I add a specific type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ConcreteTestPojo for an abstract type or interface class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.AbstractTestPojo
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.EmbeddedAbstractFieldTestPojo
Then the pojo uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.EmbeddedAbstractFieldTestPojo@1b22ea3 must be of the type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.EmbeddedAbstractFieldTestPojo
Then the pojo uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ConcreteTestPojo@d55837 must be of the type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.AbstractTestPojo

title: Podam should fill embedded abstract classes if a concrete type has been specified
